h7301.definition: a primitive root; to slake the thirst (occasionally of other appetites); bathe, make drunk, (take the) fill, satiate, (abundantly) satisfy, soak, water (abundantly).

h7303.definition: from an unused root probably meaning to cry out; outcry; Rohagah, an Israelite; Rohgah.

h7304.definition: a primitive root (identical with {{h7306}}); properly, to breathe freely, i.e. revive; by implication, to have ample room; be refreshed, large.

h7305.definition: from {{h7304}}; room, literally (an interval) or figuratively (deliverance); enlargement, space.

h7306.definition: a primitive root; properly, to blow, i.e. breathe; only (literally) to smell or (by implication, perceive (figuratively, to anticipate, enjoy); accept, smell, × touch, make of quick understanding.

h7307.definition: from {{h7306}}; wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions); air, anger, blast, breath, × cool, courage, mind, × quarter, × side, spirit(-ual), tempest, × vain, (whirl-) wind(-y).

h7311.definition: a primitive root; to be high actively, to rise or raise (in various applications, literally or figuratively); bring up, exalt (self), extol, give, go up, haughty, heave (up), (be, lift up on, make on, set up on, too) high(-er, one), hold up, levy, lift(-er) up, (be) lofty, (× a-) loud, mount up, offer (up),   presumptuously, (be) promote(-ion), proud, set up, tall(-er), take (away, off, up), breed worms.

h7312.definition: or רֻם; from {{h7311}}; (literally) elevation or (figuratively) elation; haughtiness, height, × high.

h7313.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7311}}; extol, lift up (self), set up.

h7315.definition: from {{h7311}}; elevation, i.e. (adverbially) aloft; on high.

h7316.definition: from {{h7311}}; height; Rumah, a place in Palestine; Rumah.

h7317.definition: feminine of {{h7315}}; elation, i.e. (adverbially) proudly; haughtily.

h7318.definition: from {{h7426}}; exaltation, i.e. (figuratively and specifically) praise; be extolled.

h7319.definition: feminine active participle of {{h7426}}; exaltation, i.e. praise; high.

h7320.definition: (or Romam from {{h7311}} and {{h5828}}; I have raised up a help; Romamti-Ezer, an Israelite; Romamti-ezer.

h7321.definition: a primitive root; to mar (especially by breaking); figuratively, to split the ears (with sound), i.e. shout (for alarm or joy); blow an alarm, cry (alarm, aloud, out), destroy, make a joyful noise, smart, shout (for joy), sound an alarm, triumph.

h7322.definition: a primitive root; properly, to triturate (in a mortar), i.e. (figuratively) to agitate (by concussion); tremble.

h7323.definition: a primitive root; to run (for whatever reason, especially to rush); break down, divide speedily, footman, guard, bring hastily, (make) run (away, through), post.

h7324.definition: a primitive root; to pour out (literally or figuratively), i.e. empty; × arm, cast out, draw (out), (make) empty, pour forth (out).

h7325.definition: a primitive root; to slaver (with spittle), i.e. (by analogy) to emit a fluid (ulcerous or natural); run.

h7326.definition: a primitive root; to be destitute; lack, needy, (make self) poor (man).

h7327.definition: probably for {{h7468}}; friend; Ruth, a Moabitess; Ruth.

h7328.definition: (Aramaic) from an unused root probably meaning; to attenuate, i.e. (figuratively) hide; a mystery; secret.

h7329.definition: a primitive root; to emaciate, i.e. make (become) thin (literally or figuratively); famish, wax lean.

h7331.definition: from {{h7336}}; prince; Rezon, a Syrian; Rezon.

h7335.definition: a primitive root; to twinkle the eye (in mockery); wink.

h7336.definition: a primitive root; probably to be heavy, i.e. (figuratively) honorable; prince, ruler.

h7337.definition: a primitive root; to broaden (intransitive or transitive, literal or figurative); be an en-(make) large(-ing), make room, make (open) wide.

h7338.definition: from {{h7337}}; a width; breadth, broad place.

h7339.definition: or רְחוֹב; from {{h7337}}; a width, i.e. (concretely) avenue or area; broad place (way), street. See also {{h1050}}.

h7340.definition: or רְחוֹב; the same as {{h7339}}; Rechob, the name of a place in Syria, also of a Syrian and an Israelite; Rehob.

h7341.definition: from {{h7337}}; width (literally or figuratively); breadth, broad, largeness, thickness, wideness.

h7342.definition: from {{h7337}}; roomy, in any (or every) direction, literally or figuratively; broad, large, at liberty, proud, wide.

h7343.definition: the same as {{h7342}}; proud; Rachab, a Canaanitess; Rahab.

h7344.definition: or רְחֹבֹת; plural of {{h7339}}; streets; Rechoboth, a place in Assyria and one in Palestine; Rehoboth.

h7345.definition: or רְחַבְיָהוּ; from {{h7337}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has enlarged; Rechabjah, an Israelite; Rehabiah.

h7346.definition: from {{h7337}} and {{h5971}}; a people has enlarged; Rechabam, an Israelite king; Rehoboam.

h7347.definition: from an unused root meaning to pulverize; a mill-stone; mill (stone).

h7348.definition: a form of {{h7349}}; Rechum, the name of a Persian and of three Israelites; Rehum.

h7349.definition: from {{h7355}}; compassionate; full of compassion, merciful.

h7350.definition: or רָחֹק; from {{h7368}}; remote, literally or figuratively, of place or time; specifically, precious; often used adverbially (with preposition); (a-) far (abroad, off), long ago, of old, space, great while to come.

h7351.definition: from the same as {{h7298}}; a panel (as resembling a trough); rafter.

h7353.definition: from an unused root meaning to journey; a ewe [the females being the predominant element of a flock] (as a good traveller); ewe, sheep.

h7354.definition: the same as {{h7353}}; Rachel, a wife of Jacob; Rachel.

h7355.definition: a primitive root; to fondle; by implication, to love, especially to compassionate; have compassion (on, upon), love, (find, have, obtain, shew) mercy(-iful, on, upon), (have) pity, Ruhamah, × surely.

h7356.definition: from {{h7355}}; compassion (in the plural); by extension, the womb (as cherishing the fetus); by implication, a maiden; bowels, compassion, damsel, tender love, (great, tender) mercy, pity, womb.

h7357.definition: the same as {{h7356}}; pity; Racham, an Israelite; Raham.

h7360.definition: or (feminine) רָחָמָה; from {{h7355}}; a kind of vulture (supposed to be tender towards its young); gier-eagle.

h7363.definition: a primitive root; to brood; by implication, to be relaxed; flutter, move, shake.

h7364.definition: a primitive root; to lave (the whole or a part of a thing); bathe (self), wash (self).

h7365.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h7364}} (probably through the accessory idea of ministering as a servant at the bath); to attend upon; trust.

h7367.definition: feminine of {{h7366}}; a bathing place; washing.

h7368.definition: a primitive root; to widen (in any direction), i.e. (intransitively) recede or (transitively) remove (literally or figuratively, of place or relation); (a-, be, cast, drive, get, go, keep (self), put, remove, be too, (wander), withdraw) far (away, off), loose, × refrain, very, (be) a good way (off).

h7370.definition: a primitive root; to gush; indite.

h7371.definition: from {{h7306}}; a winnowing-fork (as blowing the chaff away); shovel.

h7372.definition: a primitive root; to be moist; be wet.

h7374.definition: from an unused root meaning to tremble; terror; fear.

h7375.definition: a root compounded from {{h7373}} and {{h2954}}; to be rejuvenated; be fresh.

h7376.definition: a primitive root; to dash down; dash (in pieces).

h7377.definition: from {{h7301}}; irrigation, i.e. a shower; watering.

h7378.definition: or רוּב; a primitive root; properly, to toss, i.e. grapple; mostly figuratively, to wrangle, i.e. hold a controversy; (by implication) to defend; adversary, chide, complain, contend, debate, × ever, × lay wait, plead, rebuke, strive, × thoroughly.

h7379.definition: or רִב; from {{h7378}}; a contest (personal or legal); adversary, cause, chiding, contend(-tion), controversy, multitude (from the margin), pleading, strife, strive(-ing), suit.

h7380.definition: from {{h7378}}; contentious; Ribai, an Israelite; Ribai.

h7381.definition: from {{h7306}}; odor (as if blown); savour, scent, smell.

h7383.definition: or רִפָה; from {{h7322}}; (only plural), grits (as pounded); ground corn, wheat.

h7384.definition: or (probably by orthographical error) דִּיפַת; of foreign origin; Riphath, a grandson of Japheth and his descendants; Riphath.

h7385.definition: from {{h7324}}; emptiness; figuratively, a worthless thing; adverbially, in vain; empty, to no purpose, (in) vain (thing), vanity.

h7386.definition: or (shorter) רֵק; from {{h7324}}; empty; figuratively, worthless; emptied(-ty), vain (fellow, man).

h7387.definition: from {{h7386}}; emptily; figuratively (objective) ineffectually, (subjective) undeservedly; without cause, empty, in vain, void.

h7388.definition: from {{h7325}}; saliva; by resemblance, broth; spittle, white (of an egg).

h7389.definition: or רֵאשׁ; or רִישׁ; from {{h7326}}; poverty; poverty.

h7390.definition: from {{h7401}}; tender (literally or figuratively); by implication, weak; faint((-hearted), soft, tender ((-hearted), one), weak.

h7392.definition: a primitive root; to ride (on an animal or in a vehicle); causatively, to place upon (for riding or generally), to despatch; bring (on (horse-) back), carry, get (oneself) up, on (horse-) back, put, (cause to, make to) ride (in a chariot, on, -r), set.

h7393.definition: from {{h7392}}; a vehicle; by implication, a team; by extension, cavalry; by analogy a rider, i.e. the upper millstone; chariot, (upper) millstone, multitude (from the margin), wagon.

h7394.definition: from {{h7392}}; rider; Rekab, the name of two Arabs and of two Israelites; Rechab.

h7395.definition: from {{h7392}}; a charioteer; chariot man, driver of a chariot, horseman.

h7397.definition: probably feminine from {{h7401}}; softness; Rekah, a place in Palestine; Rechah.

h7398.definition: from passive participle of {{h7392}}; a vehicle (as ridden on); chariot.

h7399.definition: or רְכֻשׁ; from passive participle of {{h7408}}; property (as gathered); good, riches, substance.

h7400.definition: from {{h7402}}; a scandal-monger (as travelling about); slander, carry tales, talebearer.
